page.title: 16Art/Craft/Events-Alstonfield
page.content:
A large number of people in the area make fabric items (knitting, soft toys, etc.), do some woodwork and use cameras, but would not consider themselves artists or creative craftsmen.
{Events in Alstonefield} In the village there is a Gymkhana and a horse show, also a wakes. Both events go to help support the church. The Gymkhana, the Wakes and the sheep sale are all annual events. The Gymkhana is usually held in May and there are jumping classes for ponies and horses. There is also a whist drive held in the village hall on a Monday evening.
